
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a typed array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is a typed array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new {{alias:@stdlib/array/int8}}( 10 ) )
    true

    See Also
    --------
